title: Orianna is in desperate need of a new VO.
body:
In her lore Orianna helps Zaunites after a deadly chemical leak and contracts a deadly disease because of it. It's so bad that she has to keep replacing parts of her body because they keep becoming corrupted.

Orianna is intelligent, curious, lonely, and most importantly, kind. Her VO is a relic of a different era and does NOT fucking reflect who she is at all. There is 0 connection between what she says in game and who she is in the Universe. 

Examples...

""Yes, I am a weapon."
What? No you're not. You're just a lonely, cute cyborg girl.

""We will kill your enemies. That will be fun."

WHAT???  She doesn't like to kill people at all! She prefers the exact opposite! 

""I know what makes them tick. I know how to make the ticking stop."

Another line showing her nonexistent sociopathy.

And then there's a bunch of lines about her basically having no fucking idea what a human is and why they explode into bits when she sends her ball careening into their soft, fleshy bodies. She was a human. She knows how they work.

"Why do they keep breaking?"

 "They come apart so easily. How do you put them back together again?"

"So strange, they scream."

Please, god, fix her VO. She's not Frankenstein's monster. She's a kind, brilliant girl in the body of a robot.

Yordles? Aliens, they even prayed to a god damn mothership.
Anivia? Alien from some ice phoenix planet.
Malphite? Alien from a planet with living rocks.
**Even god damn Kayle and Morgana were aliens from an angel planet**.

I fail to see how a world, which reduces complex political crisis to a **sport**, can have more meaning in your eyes than what we have now.
How a world, which decided that anything mildly different is automatically alien, is better than a world which shows that the world is complex and inhabited by different beings coexisting.

So you are not familiar with retcons? Remove some champs from the IoW, retcon it's power over the world. Make it so that it only controls Demacia and Noxus. 

About that alien part: Pff, easy fix. Retcon some backstories.

I don't mind small or big changes, but removing something that was core to it, throw away champion stories and make shit like Varus lore? Lore that nobody wanted?

But it was easier to burn it all, huh? Because fuck everything that's somewhat original, right?

Orianna, the champion, wasn't a professional dancer in the old lore. She was a robot like Blitz. 

The original story was that the real Orianna, the father's daughter, who was talented in dancing, wanted to join League and died during a training session. The father made Orianna, the champion, from metal and was named after his daughter, hence, being the "clockwork" girl. This Orianna joined League in the dead one's place to fulfill her "father's" wishes. She is soulless and mimicks what the "real" Orianna would do. If you look into her Judgement story, she does not have humanity, yet tries to understand what it is, either figuratively or literally ("taking them apart"). 

The current iteration of Orianna does not have humanity either, having given away the last bit of her, the literal heart, to her father so that he could live. She is not a cyborg. She is fully robotic. The issue with this story is that they didn't write the reason behind why she is with League, which complicates things.

Both are tragic stories and both versions are striving to find what/who they are in Runeterra.
